channel.title: Help with forums.(New problem)
channel.description: Alright, I hosntly know this isit the right section, but I wouldn't know what section to post this in. What I need help with is being able to post those tabs at the top like, "ICR CHAT" and being able to custom them. Any links to any guides? I use to have it, but I forget the person that sent it, and deleted the message. So please help... I will post a picture if needed. EDIDT:New problem. Already thanks to a comment I have the tabs done. But what do I put in the "URL" part?
